document.full_text: american brendan steele broke from a pack of seven golfers with a four-under-par 68 to grab a one-shot third round lead at the texas open on saturday.
document.title: steele breaks free from pack to take texas lead
lines_and_colors: american brendan steele broke from a pack of seven golfers with a four-under-par 68 to grab a one-shot third round lead at the texas open on saturday.
